solution_line_template: To buy {total_balloons} balloons, Harry should buy one pack of {pack_size}, and {total_balloons} - {pack_size} = <<{total_balloons}-{pack_size}={separate_balloons}>>{separate_balloons} separate balloons.
In total, the pack and separate balloons would cost Harry in total {cost_of_pack} + {cost_of_separate_balloons} = $<<{cost_of_pack}+{cost_of_separate_balloons}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}.
